statements: UPSERT INTO Utilities.products (id, name, category_id) VALUES (1, 'Light Bulb', 1)
UPSERT INTO Utilities.products (id, name, category_id) VALUES (2, 'Cable', 1)
UPSERT INTO utilities.electricity_meters (id, meter_number, customer_id, reading) VALUES (1, 'E12345', 1001, 500.75) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE reading = 500.75
UPSERT INTO utilities.water_meters (id, meter_number, customer_id, reading) VALUES (2, 'W67890', 1002, 300.50) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE reading = 300.50
UPSERT INTO utilities.bill_payments (id, bill_number, customer_id, amount) VALUES (1, 'B98765', 1001, 200.00) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE amount = 200.00

UPSERT INTO utilities.electricity_meters (id, meter_number, location, installed_date) VALUES (1, 'EM001', 'Building A', '2022-01-15') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE meter_number='EM001', location='Building A', installed_date='2022-01-15';

UPSERT INTO utilities.water_meters (id, meter_number, location, installed_date) VALUES (2, 'WM002', 'Building B', '2022-02-20') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE meter_number='WM002', location='Building B', installed_date='2022-02-20';

UPSERT INTO utilities.gas_meters (id, meter_number, location, installed_date) VALUES (3, 'GM003', 'Building C', '2022-03-25') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE meter_number='GM003', location='Building C', installed_date='2022-03-25';
UPSERT INTO Tool (id, name, description, quantity) VALUES (1, 'Hammer', 'A tool for pounding nails', 10)
UPSERT INTO Tool (id, name, description, quantity) VALUES (2, 'Screwdriver', 'A tool for turning screws', 15)
UPSERT INTO Tool (id, name, description, quantity) VALUES (3, 'Wrench', 'A tool for tightening nuts and bolts', 20)
